mapper.insert: insert into T_PRIZERECORD(PR_ID, PR_EMPID, PR_REASON, PR_MONEY, PR_TIME) values (PRIZERECORD_SEQ.nextval,#{empId},#{reason},#{money},#{time})
mapper.select: select pz.PR_ID,pz.PR_EMPID,pz.PR_REASON,pz.PR_MONEY,pz.PR_TIME from T_PRIZERECORD pz where PR_EMPID=#{empId} and pz.PR_TIME between #{start} and #{end}
